poly_coeff_inverse 1001.339708 712.472078 -21.083342 -10.433843 172.728123 188.685388 76.225182 11.137737

#affine parameters "c", "d", "e"

#image size: "height" and "width"

# average pixel reprojection error

error  0.581792
